abstract: As the stock market goes back to gyrating –the Dow has been up more than 100 points, and down more than 200, during the first two hours — here, courtesy of Howard Silverblatt of Standard & Poor’s, are the Lucky 13 and the Unlucky 13 for this year.
lead_paragraph: As the stock market goes back to gyrating –the Dow has been up more than 100 points, and down more than 200, during the first two hours — here, courtesy of Howard Silverblatt of Standard & Poor’s, are the Lucky 13 and the Unlucky 13 for this year.
